Detailed Description

Run the game.

00074                       {
00075         SDL_Event event;
00076         int button;
00077         Uint32 nextTick;
00078 
00079         if (NULL == this->state) {
00080                 return;
00081         }
00082 
00083         this->done = false;
00084         while (!this->done) {
00085                 nextTick = SDL_GetTicks() + this->tickInterval;
00086 
00087                 // Listen to key or mouse events
00088                 while (SDL_PollEvent(&event)) {
00089                         this->state->event = event;
00090 
00091                         Uint8 *keystates = SDL_GetKeyState(NULL);
00092                         // Increase game speed while pressing space and moving mouse.
00093                         if (keystates[SDLK_SPACE]) {
00094                                 this->state->clockTick();
00095                         }
00096 
00097                         switch (event.type) {
00098                         case SDL_QUIT:
00099                                 this->done = true;
00100                                 break;
00101 
00102                         case SDL_KEYDOWN:
00103                                 this->state->keyPressed(event.key.keysym.sym);
00104                                 break;
00105 
00106                         case SDL_MOUSEMOTION:
00107                                 button = 0;
00108 
00109                                 if (SDL_BUTTON(1) & event.motion.state) {
00110                                         button = 1;
00111                                 } else if (SDL_BUTTON(2) & event.motion.state) {
00112                                         button = 2;
00113                                 } else if (SDL_BUTTON(3) & event.motion.state) {
00114                                         button = 3;
00115                                 }
00116 
00117                                 this->state->mouseMoved(button, event.motion.x, event.motion.y);
00118                                 break;
00119 
00120                         case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN:
00121                                 button = 0;
00122 
00123                                 if (SDL_BUTTON_LEFT == event.button.button) {
00124                                         button = 1;
00125                                 } else if (SDL_BUTTON_MIDDLE == event.button.button) {
00126                                         button = 2;
00127                                 } else if (SDL_BUTTON_RIGHT == event.button.button) {
00128                                         button = 3;
00129                                 }
00130 
00131                                 this->state->mousePressed(button, event.button.x,
00132                                                 event.button.y);
00133 
00134                                 break;
00135                         }
00136                 }
00137 
00138                 // Game tick
00139                 this->state->clockTick();
00140                 // Redraw screen
00141                 this->state->draw(screen);
00142                 // print out to screen
00143                 SDL_Flip(screen);
00144 
00145                 // if state have set a state inside state, change state.
00146                 if (NULL != this->state->state) {
00147                         this->setState(this->state->state);
00148                 }
00149 
00150                 if (this->state->done) {
00151                         this->done = true;
00152                 }
00153 
00154                 // To correct deley time.
00155                 if (SDL_GetTicks() < nextTick) {
00156                         SDL_Delay(nextTick - SDL_GetTicks());
